channel.title: EECS 16A on Adam's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in EECS 16A on Adam's Notes

item.title: Week 01-1: Introduction to Imaging
item.description: This section is primarily an introduction to the course format. No technical concepts were formally introduced during the lecture. Logistics Remote Discussions Remote discussions held on the week of January 23rd will be both live and recorded. If you cannot attend synchronously, a Google Form will be posted on the website to get attendance credit. Policies Exams will be in person. Homework will be submitted through Gradescope. The syllabus is posted on the course website.
